trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a XAML serialization attempt is made on a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>.
trans-unit.target: 对进行 XAML 序列化尝试时引发的异常<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601>或<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> and <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> are used for lambda expressions specified in code and are not XAML serializable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601>和<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>用于在代码中指定的 lambda 表达式，不可进行 XAML 序列化。</xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601></xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601>

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>, a LambdaSerializationException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试序列化包含工作流<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601>或<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>，引发 LambdaSerializationException。</xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> </xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601>

trans-unit.source: If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>, or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a serializable format.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含工作流需要 XAML 序列化，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>，或使用<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices>要转换<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601>或<xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>为可序列化格式。</xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> </xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> </xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 有关所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常，则为 null 引用异常 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果未指定内部异常是。
